ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
ygData.msgSnippet: woohoo!  If this hold out I for one will be very happy!  I think the main problem with the bard class is the low skill caps.  I think a good deal of our
ygData.messageBody:
woohoo! If this hold out I for one will be very happy! I think the main
problem with the bard class is the low skill caps. I think a good deal of
our difficulties would be helped by raising our caps especially on dodge
which I am about to hit. Making our Hide/Sneak work like rogues would be a
good idea as well. Only bards and rogues get both as class skills.

Hide : Invis even on undead, cannot move capped at 75 I think
Sneak : Will let you crawl behind mobs. Also capped at 75 I believe.

Rogues can do both at once to be invis all the time to everyone. SoW'd
sneak is about like normal walk. Sneak cannot be used with hide or with
bard invis by bards.

Kit


-----Original Message-----
From: Corey de Danann [mailto:corey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 3:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Forage gets better!


From: "Corey de Danann" <corey@...>

Hey all! Good news for those us who like the Forage skill! I was happily
running along today hitting my forage button as I always do, when I go the
message: You have become better at Forage (41). Yippeee. They have raised
the skill cap on forage. I had to log out before I found out what the max
was, but I thought I'd pass that along to you all.


Llyrean Daoine'Sidhe
Bard of the 23rd Ballad, on E'ci
